mapper.insert: insert into t_endcarteinfo (ECIID, ECISwiftNumber, ECIState, ECIdTableID, ECIWaiterID, ECICashierID, ECICustomerID, ECIMemID, ECIDishNums, ECIAmountPeoplo, ECIRepastTime, ECIBillTime, ECIPayMethod, ECIConsumeAmount, ECIDiscount, ECIPaidAmount, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy, ECIRemark) values (#{eciid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciswiftnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ecistate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ecidtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciwaiterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecicashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecicustomerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecimemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecidishnums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciamountpeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ecirepasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ecibilltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ecipaymethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eciconsumeamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ecidiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ecipaidamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eciremark,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
mapper.update: update t_endcarteinfo set ECISwiftNumber = #{eciswiftnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECIState = #{ecistate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ECIdTableID = #{ecidtableid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECIWaiterID = #{eciwaiterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECICashierID = #{ecicashierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECICustomerID = #{ecicustomerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECIMemID = #{ecimemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECIDishNums = #{ecidishnums,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECIAmountPeoplo = #{eciamountpeoplo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECIRepastTime = #{ecirepasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ECIBillTime = #{ecibilltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ECIPayMethod = #{ecipaymethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECIConsumeAmount = #{eciconsumeamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ECIDiscount = #{ecidiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ECIPaidAmount = #{ecipaidamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ECIRemark = #{eciremark,jdbcType=VARBINARY} where ECIID = #{eciid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ECIID, ECISwiftNumber, ECIState, ECIdTableID, ECIWaiterID, ECICashierID, ECICustomerID, ECIMemID, ECIDishNums, ECIAmountPeoplo, ECIRepastTime, ECIBillTime, ECIPayMethod, ECIConsumeAmount, ECIDiscount, ECIPaidAmount, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy, ECIRemark from t_endcarteinfo where ECIID = #{eciid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
